joy-entities.joy-entity: SELECT DIM_DQAXIS.dqx_name, sum(lastonly_knownterms_by_axis.frs_totalrows - lastonly_knownterms_by_axis.frs_valid_rows) AS invalidrowsbyterm FROM (select * from FACT_GOVERNANCE, (select distinct FIRST_VALUE(frs_pk) OVER(PARTITION BY TRM_FK, MET_FK, DQX_FK, ORI_FK, CON_FK, DSO_FK ORDER BY JOB_FK DESC) As frs_pk from FACT_GOVERNANCE) A Where FACT_GOVERNANCE.frs_pk = A.FRS_PK) lastonly_knownterms_by_axis, DIM_DQAXIS Where DIM_DQAXIS.dqx_PK = lastonly_knownterms_by_axis.DQX_FK And trm_fk > 0 GROUP BY DIM_DQAXIS.dqx_name, DIM_DQAXIS.DQX_FUNCKEY

SELECT DIM_DQAXIS.dqx_name, DIM_DQAXIS.DQX_FUNCKEY, sum(lastonly_knownterms_by_axis.frs_cost) AS costbyterm, sum(lastonly_knownterms_by_axis.frs_totalrows - lastonly_knownterms_by_axis.frs_valid_rows) AS invalidrowsbyterm FROM (select * from FACT_GOVERNANCE, (select distinct FIRST_VALUE(frs_pk) OVER(PARTITION BY TRM_FK, MET_FK, DQX_FK, ORI_FK, CON_FK, DSO_FK ORDER BY JOB_FK DESC) As frs_pk from FACT_GOVERNANCE) A Where FACT_GOVERNANCE.frs_pk = A.FRS_PK) lastonly_knownterms_by_axis, DIM_DQAXIS Where DIM_DQAXIS.dqx_PK = lastonly_knownterms_by_axis.DQX_FK And trm_fk > 0 GROUP BY DIM_DQAXIS.dqx_name, DIM_DQAXIS.DQX_FUNCKEY

SELECT DIM_CONTEXT.con_description, sum(lastonly_knownterms_by_axis.frs_cost) AS costbyterm, sum(lastonly_knownterms_by_axis.frs_totalrows - lastonly_knownterms_by_axis.frs_valid_rows) AS invalidrowsbyterm FROM (select * from FACT_GOVERNANCE, (select distinct FIRST_VALUE(frs_pk) OVER(PARTITION BY TRM_FK, MET_FK, DQX_FK, ORI_FK, CON_FK, DSO_FK ORDER BY JOB_FK DESC) As frs_pk from FACT_GOVERNANCE) A Where FACT_GOVERNANCE.frs_pk = A.FRS_PK) lastonly_knownterms_by_axis, DIM_CONTEXT Where DIM_CONTEXT.con_PK = lastonly_knownterms_by_axis.con_FK And trm_fk > 0 GROUP BY DIM_CONTEXT.con_description

SELECT DIM_DATASOURCE.DSO_SOURCENAME, sum(lastonly_knownterms_by_axis.frs_cost) AS costbyterm, sum(lastonly_knownterms_by_axis.frs_totalrows - lastonly_knownterms_by_axis.frs_valid_rows) AS invalidrowsbyterm FROM (select * from FACT_GOVERNANCE, (select distinct FIRST_VALUE(frs_pk) OVER(PARTITION BY TRM_FK, MET_FK, DQX_FK, ORI_FK, CON_FK, DSO_FK ORDER BY JOB_FK DESC) As frs_pk from FACT_GOVERNANCE) A Where FACT_GOVERNANCE.frs_pk = A.FRS_PK) lastonly_knownterms_by_axis, DIM_DATASOURCE Where DIM_DATASOURCE.dso_PK = lastonly_knownterms_by_axis.dso_FK And trm_fk > 0 GROUP BY DIM_DATASOURCE.DSO_SOURCENAME

SELECT DIM_TERM.TRM_NAME, sum(lastonly_knownterms_by_axis.frs_cost) AS costbyterm, sum(lastonly_knownterms_by_axis.frs_totalrows - lastonly_knownterms_by_axis.frs_valid_rows) AS invalidrowsbyterm FROM (select * from FACT_GOVERNANCE, (select distinct FIRST_VALUE(frs_pk) OVER(PARTITION BY TRM_FK, MET_FK, DQX_FK, ORI_FK, CON_FK, DSO_FK ORDER BY JOB_FK DESC) As frs_pk from FACT_GOVERNANCE) A Where FACT_GOVERNANCE.frs_pk = A.FRS_PK) lastonly_knownterms_by_axis, DIM_TERM Where DIM_TERM.trm_PK = lastonly_knownterms_by_axis.trm_FK And trm_fk > 0 GROUP BY DIM_TERM.TRM_NAME
